basic.floral_language:
Capsicum annuum
Floriography: cheerful, enthusiastic, youthful
Has a cute and elegant plant form compared with regular pepper, colorful fruits are bright and lovely, can be green, red, yellow, or purple, very high ornamental value. Full of vitamin C, popular for home vegetable gardening. 
Likes sunshine, shade properly under summer strong sunlight, flowering in June to July, fruit producing from August to winter.
basic.blooming: Ornamental vegetable plants, flowering period June-July, fruiting period August to winter
basic.color: Flower color white or purple, fruit color deep orange

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients, pH value between 6-7
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely
